title: Love at First Taste
overview: Overbearing Prince Ou Ze Ye and student Tong Xiao Man somehow spent the night together. Thanks to their daily communication, Xiao Man falls in love, but discovers that he is not human. Every full moon, Ou Ze Ye is subjected to a terrible "curse" that turns him into a bloodthirsty madman. How will the romance between the alien prince and his terminally ill "wife" end?
